profile_positions.description:
Representation of the company's interests in arbitration courts:
- preparation of statements of claim, reviews, petitions, legal positions, draft decisions, appeals and cassation complaints ;
- representation in court sessions of arbitration courts of the first, appellate and cassation instances.
Preparation of legal opinions.
profile_positions.title: Senior Counsel
Legal Advisor
Legal Advisor

skills: Оформление прав на добычу полезных ископаемых
